name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Software Engineer with 8 years of experience in software design, architecture, and full-stack development, specializing in **Python**, **CI/CD**, **Containerization**, and **MLOps** methodologies. Proficient in **AWS**, **Kafka**, and **RabbitMQ**, with a strong grasp of relational databases such as **MySQL** and **PostgreSQL**. Adept at implementing Infrastructure as Code (IaC) using **Terraform**, **CloudFormation**, and **Pulumi** while utilizing modern software development practices such as Test-Driven Development (TDD) and Behavior-Driven Development (BDD).

Possessing deep knowledge of microservices architecture and event-driven systems, I excel at building scalable and maintainable solutions aligned with compliance standards. My experience in the healthcare and financial sectors includes the deployment of enterprise-grade platforms and development of machine learning pipelines, supported by familiarity with data science and analytics using **Databricks**. Strong interpersonal and communication skills enhance my collaborative efforts in cross-functional teams.

experience.responsibilities:
- Designed and implemented software architecture frameworks, ensuring scalable and reliable systems using **Python** and modern software design principles such as Domain Driven Design.
- Developed and deployed CI/CD pipelines leveraging **GitHub Actions**, **Azure DevOps**, and **CircleCI** for efficient software delivery and quality assurance through practices like TDD and BDD.
- Utilized **Containerization** technologies, including **Docker** and **Kubernetes (K8s)**, to migrate monolithic applications to microservices architectures, achieving high availability and fault tolerance.
- Managed cloud infrastructure effectively using **AWS** and automated resource provisioning with **Terraform** and **CloudFormation** to support robust and flexible environments.
- Led the integration of messaging systems like **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ** to facilitate seamless communication between microservices.
- Engineered and optimized databases such as **PostgreSQL** for large-scale data management, ensuring efficient storage and querying.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to drive improvements in development processes and agile workflows, enhancing interpersonal and communication skills.
- Developed MLOps pipelines incorporating tools such as **MLflow** for model versioning and deployment, ensuring continuous integration of machine learning features.
- Integrated advanced analytics tools, including **Databricks**, for data science projects, applying statistical methods and model evaluation for effective decision-making.
- Implemented and maintained enterprise-level test strategies using **Jest**, **Cypress**, **PyTest**, and **Postman**, covering unit, integration, and end-to-end testing.
- Conducted training sessions and knowledge-sharing workshops, fostering a culture of continuous learning and improvement within the development team.

• Implemented advanced **Software Design** principles and **Software Architecture** best practices while leading the development of financial platforms, resulting in a **30%** increase in system scalability and maintainability.
• ORchestrated comprehensive **CI/CD** workflows using tools like **Terraform** and **CloudFormation** to streamline deployment processes, achieving **95%** deployment efficiency and reducing release cycles to **2 weeks**.
• Leveraged **Python** frameworks (FastAPI, Django) and **Node.js** technologies (NestJS, Express) to create robust backend services, addressing high-volume transaction systems with **99%** uptime.
• Enhanced code quality and reliability through **Test-Driven Development (TDD)** and **Behavior-Driven Development (BDD)** approaches, thereby decreasing bug counts by **40%** following releases.
• Developed ETL pipelines utilizing **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Data Factory**, enabling the ingestion process of financial data from internal and third-party sources at a scale of **50TB** per month.
• Designed event-driven architectures using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, improving the system's capability to handle real-time transaction processing with **1–2 seconds** latency.
• Built real-time monitoring dashboards utilizing **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, enabling analytics that further improved operational response times by **25%**.
• Applied **MLOps** methodologies to integrate AI/ML solutions for fraud detection with tools such as **scikit-learn** and **XGBoost**, reducing false positives in alerts by **15%**.
• Developed ML pipelines using **MLflow**, driving predictions for credit scoring and churn detection that improved customer retention rates by **20%**.

Utilized **Python** (FastAPI, Django) and **Node.js** (NestJS, Express) to design and optimize backend services for a global e-commerce platform, achieving **99.9%** uptime, low latency, and scalability in modules such as checkout, cart, and order fulfillment.
Implemented **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ** for event-driven architecture, creating real-time features that enable responsive order updates, dynamic inventory tracking, and real-time customer support, improving operational efficiency by **30%**.
Applied **CI/CD** practices and **Containerization** strategies using **Kubernetes** (K8s) to automate deployment pipelines, enhance collaboration, and reduce time to market by **25%**.
Engineered and managed distributed data storage solutions with **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, and **MySQL**, ensuring rapid and fault-tolerant data access for high-traffic e-commerce workflows, contributing to a **40%** decrease in query response times.
Developed user-centric frontend applications with **React** (18), **Vue 3**, and **Angular**, utilizing **TypeScript**, **Redux Toolkit**, and **Tailwind CSS** to deliver a seamless user experience across various devices, enhancing customer engagement metrics by **20%**.
Designed AI/ML-driven recommendation engines leveraging **scikit-learn**, **LightGBM**, and **TensorFlow** to optimize search relevance and improve conversion rates, leading to a **15%** increase in sales.
Implemented **TDD** and **BDD** methodologies to enhance software quality, ensuring robust application functionality through test-driven development practices.
Created feature flags and blue-green deployments using **LaunchDarkly** to facilitate controlled rollouts and A/B testing, significantly mitigating risks during major platform updates.
Established secure payment workflows integrated with **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, ensuring PCI compliance and secure handling of sensitive customer data.
Ensured GDPR compliance and user data protection through **role-based access control (RBAC)** and **OAuth 2.0**, safeguarding customer and admin access across the platform.
